description: Tag taxonomy for Context skill auto-tagging and semantic organization

tags.description: Daily information inputs - news, newsletters, articles worth archiving.
tags.purpose: Centralize recurring daily content into a searchable stream.

usage_guidelines.formatting: Add #feed in caption or let auto-tagging detect from keywords

examples: #feed Interesting AI article from morning reading

tags.description: Raw input that has entered the system but not yet been reviewed or processed.
tags.purpose: Marks content in the initial capture stage, awaiting triage or Fabric processing.

when_to_use: Automatically applied to all new captures
when_not_to_use: After content has been reviewed and tagged with 'main'

tags.description: Unprocessed content - the original capture without Fabric extraction.
tags.purpose: Preserves original transcript/content before any AI processing transforms it.

when_not_to_use: Content that has been processed by Fabric patterns
usage_guidelines.formatting: Auto-applied by pipeline for voice/document content

tags.description: Content processed through extract_wisdom or similar Fabric pattern.
tags.purpose: Identifies notes containing distilled insights, key takeaways, and actionable wisdom.

usage_guidelines.formatting: Auto-applied after /wisdom command or default Fabric processing

tags.description: Content has been processed by any Fabric pattern.
tags.purpose: Indicates AI-assisted processing has been applied to enhance the content.

tags.description: Reviewed and organized content in the main slipbox.
tags.purpose: Marks content as processed, reviewed, and ready for long-term reference.

when_to_use: When content is properly tagged and linked

tags.description: Notes from meetings, standups, syncs, and group discussions.
tags.purpose: Centralizes all meeting-related content for easy retrieval and action tracking.

usage_guidelines.formatting: Add attendees as person tags: meeting-notes + john_doe + jane_smith

examples: Project kickoff meeting-notes with full attendee list

tags.description: One-on-one meeting notes with managers, reports, or mentees.
tags.purpose: Tracks personal development conversations and private discussions.

usage_guidelines.formatting: Always include the person tag: 1on1 + person_name

tags.description: Brainstorms, concepts, and creative thoughts for future exploration.
tags.purpose: Captures nascent ideas before they're developed into projects or content.

tags.description: References to books, papers, and academic sources.
tags.purpose: Maintains a reading list and citation sources for research.

usage_guidelines.formatting: Include author and title in the note

tags.description: Curated web articles and blog posts worth saving.
tags.purpose: Archives notable online content for future reference.
